<h3 id="X38098">X(38098) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(8), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a-11*b-11*c  :  :
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; 15 r - 22 R sin B sin C : :
<b><br>
X(38098) = 5*X(1)-11*X(2) = 7*X(1)+11*X(8) = 2*X(1)-11*X(10) = 8*X(1)-11*X(551) = 17*X(1)-11*X(3241) = 20*X(1)-11*X(3244) = 16*X(1)+11*X(3625) = X(1)+11*X(3679) = 4*X(1)+11*X(4669) = 13*X(1)+11*X(4677) = 3*X(1)-11*X(19875) = 6*X(1)-11*X(19883) = 7*X(1)-11*X(25055) = 19*X(1)+11*X(31145) = 7*X(2)+5*X(8) = 2*X(2)-5*X(10) = 8*X(2)-5*X(551) = 13*X(2)-10*X(1125) = 17*X(2)-5*X(3241) = 4*X(2)-X(3244) = 16*X(2)+5*X(3625) = X(2)+2*X(3626) = 5*X(2)+X(3632) = 17*X(2)-20*X(3634) = 7*X(2)-4*X(3636) = X(2)+5*X(3679) = 7*X(2)-10*X(3828) = 4*X(2)+5*X(4669) = 13*X(2)+5*X(4677) = X(2)+20*X(4691) = X(2)-10*X(4745) = 19*X(2)+20*X(4746) = 10*X(2)-7*X(15808) = 3*X(2)-5*X(19875) = 6*X(2)-5*X(19883) = 13*X(2)-X(20050) = 19*X(2)-7*X(20057) = 7*X(2)-5*X(25055) = 19*X(2)+5*X(31145) = 2*X(8)+7*X(10)
</b>
<p>
This triangle has collinear vertices.</p>
<p>X(38098) lies on these lines: {1,2}, {30,38127}, {355,15681}, {382,3654}, {515,15688}, {516,38074}, {517,38071}, {518,38094}, {524,38191}, {527,38201}, {528,38213}, {529,38214}, {546,11362}, {550,28208}, {594,16590}, {758,38100}, {946,11737}, {952,38068}, {966,36911}, {2802,3921}, {3524,28236}, {3528,34627}, {3529,34638}, {3655,15720}, {3681,4744}, {3839,28228}, {3851,4301}, {3855,31162}, {3913,16860}, {3918,24473}, {3982,11237}, {3992,4793}, {4015,31165}, {4084,4662}, {4297,34200}, {4421,17571}, {4540,10914}, {4681,4709}, {4686,4732}, {4711,5883}, {4733,28558}, {4796,10022}, {5055,28234}, {5232,36588}, {5288,36006}, {5690,15687}, {5790,14269}, {5844,38083}, {5846,38089}, {5847,38087}, {5850,38092}, {5853,38101}, {5854,38104}, {5855,38105}, {5881,10299}, {5882,14869}, {6684,15700}, {8715,19526}, {10109,11278}, {10164,17504}, {10304,37712}, {11194,17573}, {11545,30331}, {13607,15694}, {15707,26446}, {15863,35023}, {16857,25439}, {17251,28301}, {17320,32101}, {28202,38138}, {31399,35018}, {34632,37714}</p>
<p>
X(38098) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {8, 25055}, {10304, 37712}<br>
X(38098) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (19883, 19875), (25055, 3828)<br>
X(38098) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 3244, 551), (2, 3679, 3626), (2, 31145, 20057), (8, 10, 19862), (10, 3626, 3244), (10, 3679, 4669), (10, 4669, 551), (10, 19883, 19875), (551, 4669, 3625), (3244, 19862, 3636), (3617, 3679, 4745), (3617, 4691, 10), (3626, 3636, 8), (3632, 15808, 3244), (3636, 3828, 2), (3654, 34648, 5493), (3679, 4677, 4678), (3679, 4745, 10), (4691, 4745, 3679), (38127, 38176, 38155)<br>
